sentences.sentence: We need a factotum to take care of the workshop.
sentences.translation: 我们需要一个杂役来负责车间的事情。

sentences.sentence: The old man who was his indoor factotum came at the same moment to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，那位担任家务总管的老头儿来到了楼梯下。
